casebody.data:
Steven W. BERNSTEIN, petitioner,
v.
WELLS FARGO BANK, N.A., et al. No. 17-6954. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 20, 2018.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until March 13, 2018, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rule of this Court.
